DOC.brief_summary: Patients advanced ovarian cancer ( FIGO stage III C ) highly disseminated tumor randomize two arm : primary debulking surgery follow adjuvant chemotherapy vs. neoadjuvant chemotherapy follow interval debulking surgery ( IDS ) . The primary end point evaluation comparison surgical complication primary surgery IDS evaluation progression free survival ( PFS )
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Complications Related Primary Interval Debulking Ovarian Neoplasm
DOC.criteria: Patients suspect advanced ovarian cancer ( FIGO stage IIIC ) PIV ≥ 8 , PIV ≤ 12 Estimated life expectancy least 4 week . PS ≤ 2 Appropriate respiratory , hepatic , cardiological , bone marrow renal function ( Creatinine Clearance > 60 mL/min accord Cockcroft formula ) Patient capable consent . Pregnancy breastfeed . Nonappropriate respiratory , hepatic , cardiological , bone marrow renal function Large size mass reach xiphoid , occupy abdominal cavity and/or infiltrate abdominal wall . Mesenteric retraction
